subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Andre Iguodala and Andre Miller each had 16 points and 9 assists last night to help the Philadelphia 76ers defeat the Miami Heat in overtime, 98-95, after blowing a 17-point lead.
snippet: Andre Iguodala and Andre Miller each had 16 points and 9 assists last night to help the Philadelphia 76ers defeat the Miami Heat in overtime, 98-95, after blowing a 17-point lead.
